subject: Lacrosse
College Athletics
organizations: State University of New York at Stony Brook
lead_paragraph: The Seawolves are ranked fifth in the preseason coaches’ poll, the best in program history, thanks in large part to Kevin Crowley, a first-team all-American last season.
snippet: The Seawolves are ranked fifth in the preseason coaches’ poll, the best in program history, thanks in large part to Kevin Crowley, a first-team all-American last season.
